artist: Artist: Nicolas Africano; Publisher: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man seated in a chair facing away from viewer reading book; text " Well time cures hearts/of tenderness" repeated four times
inscription:
Signature Title Date, inscription, Edition and Chop

Along right side of image in grey: [Well time cures hearts/of tenderness] repeated four times
markings: LR: VEL chop mark; LL in pencil: [A.P. 5/5]
signed: lower margin in pencil: [Nicolas Africano 1990]; at top in grey: [Reading Wessex Heights/August 1987]
title: Reading Wessex Heights, August 1987, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
